Quantum CSS Library: Improvement Roadmap
description: Track the implementation of improvements identified in improvement.md to enhance the library's robustness, developer experience, and flexibility.
close_reason: Successfully implemented all identified improvements from improvement.md. 1. Complete Utility Coverage (gradients, text-clip, expanded colors). 2. Decoupled Theme from Structure (base + aesthetic classes). 3. Configuration & Variable Consistency (dynamic :root generation, --q- prefix). 4. Enhanced SVG Support (scaling utilities, overlays). 5. Documentation & Reliability (README updates, Kitchen Sink).

title: Complete Utility Coverage
description:
- Gradients: Add full support for bg-gradient-to-* (r, l, t, b, tr, tl, br, bl) along with from-*, via-*, and to-* stops.
- Typography: Ensure text-transparent and bg-clip-text are consistently available across all themes.
- Colors: Ensure all theme colors (e.g., starlight-blue, starlight-peach) have corresponding text-*, bg-*, and border-* utilities, including opacity variants (e.g., bg-primary/20).
close_reason: Implemented comprehensive utility coverage: background gradients, color stops, text-transparent, bg-clip-text, and expanded standard theme colors (purple, yellow, pink, cyan, indigo) with opacity support.

title: Decouple Theme from Structure
description:
- Abstract Logic: Separate structural classes (e.g., nav-base, card-base) from aesthetic classes (e.g., theme-starlight, theme-glass).
- Flexible Defaults: Re-evaluate default layouts for components. For example, starlight-nav should likely default to a row layout rather than a column layout to match standard web patterns.
close_reason: Decoupled component presets from their aesthetic themes. Abstracted structural logic into base classes (nav-base, card-base, etc.) and aesthetic logic into theme classes (theme-starlight, theme-glass). Updated starlight-nav to default to row layout.

title: Configuration & Variable Consistency
description:
- Dynamic Propagation: Ensure that changes in the config.json theme section correctly propagate to the CSS variables used by components.
- Naming Standards: Standardize variable naming (e.g., use --q-color-primary consistently) to avoid confusion between library-provided variables and user-defined ones.
close_reason: Ensured dynamic propagation of theme configuration to CSS variables. Standardized all variables to use the '--q-' prefix. Implemented :root generation in JIT to allow configuration changes to override static variables.

title: Enhanced SVG & Data Visualization Support
description:
- Scaling Utilities: Add utility classes to handle SVG preserveAspectRatio and viewBox scaling issues (e.g., svg-fluid, svg-fixed-text).
- Component Overlays: Provide standardized patterns for absolute-positioned overlays (like data labels) that don't stretch with fluid SVG backgrounds.
close_reason: Enhanced SVG and data visualization support by adding svg-fluid, svg-contain, svg-cover, and vector-non-scaling utilities. Provided standardized overlay patterns (overlay-base, overlay-top-left, etc.) for absolute positioning over SVG backgrounds.

title: Documentation & Reliability
description:
- Component Specs: Clearly document the internal CSS properties of presets (like starlight-nav) so developers know exactly what they are overriding.
- Error Boundaries: Ensure that if a theme or plugin is missing in the config, the library falls back gracefully rather than breaking the layout.
close_reason: Updated README.md with comprehensive documentation for the new decoupled component architecture, advanced utilities (gradients, SVG scaling), and the standardized naming system. Verified 'Kitchen Sink' documentation generation with new tokens.

title: Standardize common UI patterns from examples into quantum.css
description:
Add reusable component classes to quantum.css based on patterns found in new example files:

**Patterns to standardize:**
1. App Layout (.app-layout, .sidebar, .main-content)
2. Navigation (.nav-item, .nav-section, .nav-section-title)
3. Stat Cards (.stat-card, .stat-icon with color variants)
4. Icon Buttons (.icon-btn, .action-btn)
5. Avatars (.avatar with sm/md/lg/xl sizes)
6. Status Badges (.status-badge, .badge-count)
7. Search Inputs (.search-input, .search-box)
8. Status Indicators (.online-indicator, .notification-dot)

**Source files:** examples/admin-panel.html, examples/analytics-dashboard.html, examples/chat-messaging.html, examples/email-template.html, examples/music-streaming.html, examples/portfolio-resume.html, examples/video-streaming.html

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- All patterns documented above are added to quantum-components.css
- Classes follow existing naming conventions
- Light/dark mode support included
- Responsive behavior preserved
close_reason:
Completed: Added standardized UI patterns to quantum-components.css including:

**App Layout:** .app-layout, .sidebar, .main-content, .top-nav, .page-header
**Navigation:** .nav-item, .nav-section, .nav-section-title, .nav-badge
**Stat Cards:** .stat-card, .stat-icon (with blue/green/orange/purple/red variants), .stat-trend (up/down)
**Icon Buttons:** .icon-btn (with circle/sm/lg variants), .action-btn, .action-btn-delete
**Avatars:** .avatar (with sm/md/lg/xl sizes), .user-cell, .user-info
**Status Badges:** .status-badge (active/pending/inactive), .role-badge, .badge-count, .label (work/personal/important)
**Search Inputs:** .search-box, .search-input, .filter-select
**Status Indicators:** .online-indicator (with away/busy/offline variants), .notification-dot, .notification-badge
**Pagination:** .pagination, .page-btn

All patterns include light/dark mode support and responsive breakpoints. Build successful - quantum.min.css updated (95.62 KB).
